privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.description: At AlHayat, we value your trust and take your privacy seriously.
privacyPolicyPage.commitmentText: AlHayat values client privacy. Any information pertaining to the operations of your organization will be held strictly confidential. We require strict adherence by all our staff to the ethical rules of our profession. The firm and its employees maintain strict confidentiality towards information obtained while carrying out professional duties and remain independent in relationships with clients. Our goal is to provide quality and transcendent services to all our clients.
privacyPolicyPage.personalInfoText: Our commitment to clients is to protect personal and business information entrusted to us during professional services. Each of our employees is responsible for maintaining confidentiality and security. The Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) governs how personal information is handled. Personal information includes identifiable details like home address, date of birth, and financial information.
privacyPolicyPage.rulesText: The AlHayat team follows the Rules of Professional Conduct maintained by the IFAC. These rules establish standards for collecting and using personal information.
privacyPolicyPage.recourseText: If you have concerns or complaints about your personal information or our Privacy Policy, contact our Privacy and Confidentiality leader in writing by email or mail.
